heading: Contact Us
emptyFields: Please provide values for all fields before submitting a message.
formSubmittedRecently: You last submitted a message on {{dateOfLastMessage}}. Please wait up to three days from your last message before sending another one. We appreciate your patience!
errorProcessingMessage: An error occurred while processing your message. Please try again later.
messageSentSuccesfully: Form successfully submitted! We will get in touch with you within three days. Please wait three days before submitting another message.
phonePatternMessage: Please enter a valid phone number. It should be in the format: (+)xxxxxxxxxxxx, where the plus is optional.
emailPatternMessage: Please include an '@' in the email address
textAreaMessage: Please lengthen this text to {{minlength}} characters or more (you are currently using {{characters}})
ogDescription: Have questions or need assistance? Get in touch with Inance - we're here to help and look forward to hearing from you.
